title: Taliban Camp David Invitation
summary: Trump invited Taliban leaders to Camp David for peace talks just days before 18th anniversary of 9/11. Taliban responsible for harboring al-Qaeda before 9/11 attacks. Meeting canceled after Taliban claimed responsibility for attack killing US soldier. Rep. Liz Cheney: 'Camp David is where America's leaders met to plan our response to the 9/11 terrorist attacks.'
keyFacts: Trump invited Taliban leaders to Camp David for peace talks
Planned meeting scheduled for September 8, 2019 - just days before 18th anniversary of 9/11
Taliban responsible for harboring al-Qaeda before 9/11 attacks
Meeting canceled after Taliban claimed responsibility for attack killing US soldier
Rep. Liz Cheney: 'Camp David is where America's leaders met to plan our response to the 9/11 terrorist attacks'
